text: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
author: Redd Foxx

text: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder.
author: Kinky Friedman

text: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
author: James Dean

text: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
author: William Penn
